The exceptional comfort of reading: thanks to the 6-inch touch screen with E Ink Carta technology, you can enjoy eye-safe and comfortable reading anywhere. The screen’s optical characteristics are close to ordinary paper, so it does not glare in the sun and does not tire your eyes.New Touchscreen Read in any lighting: with PocketBook Basic Lux 4, you can enjoy an exciting book anywhere and anytime, regardless of the lighting. Just turn on the front light and read even in total darkness.  Wi-Fi, Cloud services & free dictionaries: use Wi-Fi for online shopping in any online store, operate your library and synchronize your books with other devices via PocketBook Cloud and Dropbox. Read and learn more productively thanks to 11 preloaded dictionaries and additional 42 free language combinations.  Create your huge library: Basic Lux 4 supports 25 formats including the most popular: ACSM, AZW, CBZ, DJVU, DOC, EPUB, FB2, PDF, TXT, JPEG, and PNG. The device has enough space to store all your books: in addition to the built-in memory of 8 GB, the e-reader has a slot for memory cards.  Super handy & lightweight: the device is highly compact and user-friendly, as it weighs only 155 g, fits easily in any bag, and is equipped with a touchscreen and mechanical buttons for control and page-turning.  Up to a month without recharging: enjoy unlimited reading with the energy-efficient Basic Lux 4! One full charge of the device provides up to a month of active reading.

Newest Most Colorful E-Reader: The new R1 Color E-Reader takes color viewing to a whole new level of amazing with our advanced Kaleido Plus Screen. This upgraded color inkscreen with 100ppi realism delivers impressive brighter colors and far more detail. It puts brilliant, complex color back into magazines, comics, books, news, posters and more for greater realism and enjoyment.6.9mm Slim Body – R1 Color E-Reader is thinner than your phone and super lightweight at just 150g (5 ounces). It easy to carry in your pocket, purse, backpack or car. It’s safe with highly beneficial blue light protection to reduce eye fatigue when reading. Ideal for enjoying books on all your favorite topics and interests. Great for getting kids to read.Quad-Core CPU for Smoother Reading – This customized processor has been engineered for problem free reading when enjoying complex colors and pages. It offers fast response with low power consumption for long periods between recharge. This runs Android apps for a feature that makes this the most flexible and capable design yet.32G Storage to Hold Tens of Thousands of Books – Plenty of highly capable storage lets you store an entire library of books, magazines, comic books, and other publications. You can even listen to audio books via bluetooth headphones. Completely adjustable displays lets you specify your favorite front size, margins, and line spacing. This even blocks blue light for less eye fatigue.Great Gift Idea – The R1 Color E-Reader makes a spectacular gift for the reader in your life. Many people are getting several of these to leave around the house, take in the car, and keep at work. It’s selling fast after being spotlighted by librarians as a revolution in easy offline access to books and reading materials.
